item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋广泛传播人工智能，中美僵局有望解冻
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，伊恩-金将报道英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋在华盛顿举行的 GTC 大会上的讲话。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King reports on Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang at the company’s GTC conference in Washington.】

item.title: 贝尔首席执行官称加拿大人工智能主权是国家安全问题
item.description: BCE Inc.首席执行官 Mirko Bibic 表示，随着地缘政治紧张局势的加剧，加拿大的敏感数据必须留在国内。【原文：BCE Inc. Chief Executive Officer Mirko Bibic said sensitive Canadian data must stay within the country, as geopolitical tensions rise.】

item.title: 交易员为 2026 年 12 月前 S&P 500 指数上涨 30% 下注 2100 万美元
item.description: 一位期权交易商甚至让最看涨的华尔街分析师都显得小心翼翼，他对 S&P 500 指数在明年年底前上涨 30% 以上下了大赌注。【原文：One options trader is making even the most bullish Wall Street analysts look cautious, placing a huge bet on the S&P 500 Index shooting up more than 30% by the end of next year.】

item.title: 美联储可能降息，官员正面临数据真空
item.description: 7 月，华盛顿，美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在联邦公开市场委员会（FOMC）会议后的新闻发布会上。摄影师：Al Drago/Bloomberg【原文：Jerome Powell, chairman of the US Federal Reserve, during a news conference following a Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting in Washington in July. Photographer: Al Drago/Bloomberg】

item.title: Vibe 编码领导者光标表示，新的人工智能代理能完成更艰巨的任务
item.description: 人工智能编码初创公司 Cursor 正在发布其受欢迎的人工智能助手的新版本，该版本旨在从头到尾执行更复杂的软件开发任务，可与 OpenAI 和 Anthropic 的产品相媲美。【原文：Cursor, an artificial intelligence coding startup, is releasing a new version of its popular AI assistant that’s designed to carry out more complicated software development tasks from start to finish, rivaling products from OpenAI and Anthropic.】

item.title: 美国银行认为美国国债供应增加将抑制 10 年期国债收益率
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）的利率策略师表示，预计美国财政部将倾向于用短期票据为赤字融资的决定有可能推动 10 年期国债收益率下跌超过四分之一个百分点。【原文：An anticipated decision by the US Treasury Department to favor short-term bills to finance the deficit has the potential to drive 10-year note yields lower by more than a quarter point, interest-rate strategists at Bank of America say.】

item.title: 中国首次采购美国大豆的消息令大豆贸易商感到失望
item.description: 大豆交易商对中国本季首次购买美国大豆的消息感到失望，因为他们正在等待北京和华盛顿之间备受期待的协议细节。【原文：Soybean traders were underwhelmed by news of China’s first purchases of US cargoes this season, as they await details from a highly anticipated agreement between Beijing and Washington.】

item.title: 北美矿商以 2013 年以来最快速度抛售股票
item.description: 矿业公司正在以十年来最快的速度抛售股票，而那些希望接触到大幅上涨的金价和需求旺盛的关键矿产的投资者们已经欲罢不能了。【原文：Mining companies are selling shares at the fastest clip in a decade, and investors looking for exposure to sharply higher gold prices and in-demand critical minerals can’t get enough.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒称人工智能比推土机更能推动增长
item.description: 卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.【原文：Caterpillar Inc., the company synonymous with yellow bulldozers and mining trucks, is getting a boost from another type of machinery.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，有线电视亿万富翁马龙将卸任自由主席一职
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，亿万富翁、有线电视大亨约翰-马龙（John Malone）即将卸任其媒体和电信帝国的主席一职，这标志着他作为行业先驱和当时一些最重要的媒体和有线电视交易的总设计师，结束了长达数十年的职业生涯。【原文：The billionaire cable-TV mogul John Malone is stepping down as chair of his media and telecoms empire, the Financial Times reported, marking an end to a decades-long career as an industry pioneer and master architect of some of the most significant media and cable deals of his time.】

item.title: 纽约市立大学深化与中心桥、贝恩的合作，帮助学生就业
item.description: 纽约城市大学正在深化与 Centerbridge Partners 和 Bain & Co.等公司的联系，扩大旨在帮助学生毕业时获得工作机会的项目，以提高入学率和保留率。【原文：The City University of New York is deepening its ties with firms like Centerbridge Partners and Bain & Co. to expand programs aimed at helping students graduate with job offers in a bid to boost enrollment and retention.】

item.title: 欧盟资金激增，欧洲顶级无人机制造商欲在华沙上市
item.description: WB Electronics SA 正在考虑在华沙证券交易所出售股票，因为这家欧盟销售额最大的无人机生产商正准备根据欧盟的新国防计划扩大投资规模。【原文：WB Electronics SA is considering selling shares on the Warsaw bourse, as the largest drone producer by sales in the European Union prepares to scale up investments under the bloc’s new defense program.】

item.title: 拉弗为英国经济困境开出药方
item.description:
共和党的反税吟游诗人在本周的Merryn Talks Money节目中进行了解释。【原文：

The Republican Party’s anti-tax bard joins this week’s Merryn Talks Money to explain. 

】

item.title: 亚马逊的两款新 Echo 扬声器明显胜出— 无论有没有 Alexa+
item.description:
评论：售价 100 美元的 Echo Dot Max outshighs the pricier Echo Studio.

【原文：

Review: The $100 Echo Dot Max outshines the pricier Echo Studio.

】

item.title: 劳动力市场担忧加剧，美国成屋待完成销售停滞不前
item.description: 9 月份，美国现房待售量停滞不前，这表明尽管抵押贷款利率出现了可喜的放宽，但对就业市场的焦虑仍使潜在购房者望而却步。【原文：Pending sales of existing US homes stalled in September, suggesting anxiety about the job market kept potential buyers sidelined despite a welcome easing in mortgage rates.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率下调至 2.25%，利率水平 "恰到好处
item.description: 加拿大央行下调了利率，因为它认为美国关税造成的损害仍在持续，但同时表示，只要其预测得以实现，借贷成本大致就会处于合适的位置。【原文：The Bank of Canada cut interest rates as it sees damage from US tariffs persisting, but signaled that borrowing costs are roughly at the right place as long as its forecasts materialize.】

item.title: 期权专业人士看到零售定向结构性产品的商机
item.description: 通过交易所交易产品和结构性产品进行零售交易的最新发展为小型参与者提供了更复杂的策略，同时也为对冲基金和其他大型交易商提供了从市场混乱中获利的机会。【原文：The latest outgrowth of retail trading via exchange-traded and structured products is opening more sophisticated strategies to smaller participants but also offering hedge funds and other large traders opportunities to profit from dislocations in markets.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数先于美联储上涨，英伟达触及历史性的 5 万亿美元大关
item.description: 周三，随着华尔街为包括美联储利率决定和三大科技巨头财报在内的密集议程做好准备，美国股市继续保持以科技为主导的涨势。【原文：US stocks continued their technology-led rally on Wednesday as Wall Street geared up for a jam-packed agenda that includes a Federal Reserve interest-rate decision and earnings from three technology behemoths.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团预计智利铜矿将于 2027 年恢复满负荷生产
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）预计，其位于智利的旗舰铜矿将在2027年恢复到正常产量水平，而在此之前，矿石质量较低的时期将限制明年的产量。【原文：Anglo American Plc’s expects its flagship copper mine in Chile to return to normal output levels in 2027 after grappling with a period of lower quality ore that’s set to constrain production next year.】

item.title: 甲骨文债券风险因对人工智能消费热潮的担忧而飙升
item.description: 信用交易员正在购买甲骨文公司债务违约保护，摩根士丹利认为，随着这家科技巨头将数十亿资金投入人工智能领域，这一趋势在短期内仍将持续。【原文：Credit traders are buying protection against Oracle Corp. defaulting on its debt, a trend that Morgan Stanley sees continuing in the near term as the tech giant pours billions into artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Codelco 在战略转变中权衡边缘铜资产的命运
item.description: 智利国营铜业巨头 Codelco 公司的一些官员正在推动利润优先于产量的转变，Codelco 公司正在仔细研究未来几年的运营和投资方案。【原文：Codelco is scrutinizing operational and investment options for the coming years as some officials at the Chilean state copper behemoth push for a shift toward prioritizing profit over production.】

item.title: Character.AI 将禁止 18 岁以下儿童与其聊天机器人交谈
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Character.AI 将禁止儿童在其平台上与聊天机器人对话，因为立法者的压力越来越大，而且有大量诉讼指控该公司的所谓角色对儿童造成了伤害。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Character.AI will ban kids from having conversations with chatbots on its platform following growing pressure from lawmakers and a raft of lawsuits alleging the company’s so-called characters are responsible for harms to children.】

item.title: 立陶宛以 "混合攻击 "为由关闭与白俄罗斯的边境
item.description: 立陶宛总理谴责走私者的气球对空中交通造成的干扰是一种混合攻击，因此立陶宛关闭了与白俄罗斯的边境一个月。【原文：Lithuania closed its border with Belarus for a month as the premier denounced disruptions to air traffic caused by smugglers’ balloons as a hybrid attack.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚的数字税收计划有可能扼杀支付革命
item.description: 哥伦比亚政府提议对数字交易征收预扣税，这有可能扼杀中央银行减少现金使用、革新支付系统的计划。【原文：A Colombian government proposal to charge withholding tax on digital transactions risks strangling the central bank’s plan to cut the use of cash and revolutionize the payments system.】

item.title: 葡萄牙警方在腐败调查中锁定毕马威会计师事务所和新银行
item.description: 葡萄牙警方周三对毕马威会计师事务所（KPMG LLP）的里斯本办事处进行了搜查，这是对涉及诺和诺德银行（Novo Banco SA）的腐败指控进行调查的一部分。【原文：Portuguese police on Wednesday carried out searches at the Lisbon offices of KPMG LLP as part of an investigation into corruption allegations involving Novo Banco SA.】

item.title: 特朗普对东盟国家的关税减免力度不大
item.description: 美国总统正在亚洲签署协议，为该地区的出口锁定更高的成本【原文：The US president is signing deals in Asia that lock in higher costs for exports from the region】

item.title: 丹麦克朗创五年新低，央行采取行动几率上升
item.description: 经济学家表示，丹麦克朗贬值至 2020 年以来的最低水平，可能会迫使该国央行出手捍卫该货币与欧元的挂钩关系。【原文：A weakening of the Danish krone to its lowest level since 2020 may force the country’s central bank to step in to defend the currency’s peg to the euro, economists said.】

item.title: Uber 将与 Lucid 和 Nuro Robotaxis 在旧金山对抗 Waymo
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）准备明年首次在旧金山湾区提供由 Lucid Group 公司和 Nuro 公司开发的无人驾驶汽车，这将使该公司与 Waymo 的机器人出租车服务展开直接竞争。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is preparing to offer driverless rides on vehicles developed by Lucid Group Inc. and Nuro Inc. in the San Francisco Bay Area for the first time next year, thrusting the company into direct competition with Waymo’s robotaxi service.】

item.title: Harry You SPAC 计划与盒装诊所公司 OnMed 合并
item.description: 空头支票交易老手 Harry You 的最新特殊目的收购公司正寻求与一家经营便携式保健站的企业合并。【原文：Blank-check deal veteran Harry You’s latest special purpose acquisition company is looking to merge with a business that operates portable health-care stations.】

item.title: 乍得寻求 300 亿美元五年发展计划的支持者
item.description: 乍得正在邀请投资者和捐助者前往阿布扎比，因为这个西非国家正在为一项价值 300 亿美元的计划寻求融资，以开发贸易走廊、重要矿产矿山和农业项目。【原文：Chad is inviting investors and donors to Abu Dhabi as the West African nation seeks financing for a $30 billion plan to develop trade corridors, critical-minerals mines and agricultural projects.】
